page.title: 02RECREATION AND LEISURE
page.content: There are excellent facilities in the area for a wide variety of interests. The main centre is at Lasswade High School Centre where an excellent {sports centre}provides facilities for and instruction in many types of sports, including{athletics, archery, {badminton, squash, angling, {trampolining.}Other outdoor sports are catered for at Broomieknowe{Golf}Club Kevock{Riding}Stables, Bonnyrigg {Tennis}Club, Lasswade{Rugby}Club, Bonnyrigg and Lasswade{Bowling}Clubs, Several{football}clubs- the main one being Bonnyrigg Rose Junior Football Club. Other indoor sports centres are Bonnyrigg{Swimming}Pool,{snooker}clubs in Bonnyrigg and Loanhead, Loanhead {Gymnastics}Club, the Midlothian Sports Club.
